content:
docker-compose.yml

version: "3.8"
services:
    mongo:
      image: mongo
      container_name: mongodb
      restart: always
      ports:
        - 27017:27017
      volumes:
        - /home/eramax/dev/docker/mongodb/db:/data/db  
      environment:
        MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root
        MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: example

docker-compose up -d
title: Run MongoDB as a Docker Container
